item.title: Automotive Multivariate Visualization
item.description: body { text-align: justify} This is a session dedicated to multivariate data visualization using some tipical feature of automobile. Here below we can see the matrix of correlation between features and a graphical representation. mpg cyl disp hp drat wt qsec vs am gear carb mpg 1.00 -0.85 -0.85 -0.78 0.68 -0.87 0.42 0.66 0.60 0.48 -0.55 cyl -0.85 1.00 0.90 0.83 -0.70 0.78 -0.59 -0.81 -0.

item.title: Google Maps integration with R
item.description: body { text-align: justify} This is an exmaple about the great advantages to use google maps in combinatin to R. This could be particularly useful in fraud prevention area. Thi can help fraud investigators to track the movements of the cardholders and how rapidly they use the card. The distance and velocity between two distinct purchase of goods is an indicator of fraud. X FID lat lon build_time 1 1 0 58.
